presentation-p: FRONTEND developer from buenos Aires, Argentina.
about-text1: Hello! I'm glad you're here! My name is Rodrigo, I'm a frontend developer based in Buenos Aires. I finished Coderhouse's Frontend bootcamp and I'm studying React Native and Node.js.
about-text2: Apart from coding, I'm a psychologist.
about-text3: I'm currently a React Developer at LoopStudio (from Uruguay).
about-tech: These are the main thechnologies I'm working with:
projects-art-desc: Prototype of an online art gallery.
projects-hero-desc: Select superheroes and villains to form a team. The data comes from Superhero-API.
projects-esp-desc: Web App version of the first 10 poems of Girondo's 'Espantap√°jaros'
projects-simpsons-desc: Who said...? Quotes, characters and images fetched from The Simpsons Quote API
